name: matches_get_leanback
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cricbuzz_cricket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
API description: Fetches leanback information for a given cricket match using the match ID.

matchid.description: The value of matchId field returned in …/matches/list, …/schedules/list, …/series/get-matches, …/teams/get-schedules, …/teams/get-results, …/venues/get-matches endpoints.
